summary: A premium residential installation featuring integrated battery storage for complete energy independence.
description: This stunning estate in Scottsdale features a 50 kW solar array paired with a 40 kWh battery system. The design carefully integrates with the home's architecture while maximizing solar exposure. The homeowner now enjoys near-zero electricity bills and backup power capability.
highlights: 40 kWh battery storage for backup power

testimonial.quote: The team at Third Fuse Energy designed a system that perfectly matches our home's aesthetic while providing complete energy independence. We couldn't be happier!
testimonial.author: Dr. Patricia Williams
